Search Form

For a listing website, a great search form is a must. Discoverize equipped with interactive search form with various layout

Interactive

Search form with minimal design that's expand and shows essential options on user focus.

Design

With the power of Bootstrap Grid System and Custom CSS Classes, Discoverize can fit nicely to any device
